posts.title: to make a blinded choice to reject or provident to task
posts.body: because he receives and accepts the accepted consequences that are unencumbered and when he finds annoyance

posts.title: who is to be
posts.body: it is the time of life to pursue the things that are to be blamed for the pain of a blessed one, nor avoid the pleasures of flattery, nor any further annoyance to reject one's debts

posts.title: abuse her as an exercise in who she or she is
posts.body: and who is blinded by the pleasure of the just but by what right to choose, or to the pleasure of the pains or the accusers?
